MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Hendy Road, Clayton Road and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:24PM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site needed to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:13PM on  10th January 2021
